text: WRKI (95.1 MHz, "I-95") is an American commercial FM radio station licensed in Brookfield, Connecticut, and serves Fairfield, Litchfield and New Haven Counties in Connecticut. From its tower at more than 1200 feet above sea level (HAAT:194 m./674 ft.) WRKI's 29,500 watt signal can be heard in such large Connecticut cities as Bridgeport, Danbury, Stamford and New Haven. Category:Radio stations in the United States Category:Connecticut
title: WRKI
